column1: Art Institute of Chicago////That isn't a portrait
column2: it's a physical structure inside the exhibit
column3: and that is a real person looking at it (I talked to her in line
column5: but that tends to happen a lot). This was the featured attraction that ended on 5/10/16. It was so crowded (at about 2pm on a Monday) that it made it difficult to enjoy it and really take in everything. In this way
column6: this pic represents how I was trying to get a look at everything
column7: but couldn't quite see it all (like her). Plus
column9: I really wish I could use that bed.
